hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "Starting job" __ROBOT_FILE__ robot -d ${WORKSPACE}/output/ ${WORKSPACE}/executionFile.robot mkdir -p /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__ robotmetrics --output ${WORKSPACE}/output/output.xml --email false sudo rm ${WORKSPACE}/output/output.xml sudo mv metrics*.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/index.html sudo mv ${WORKSPACE}/output/report.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/report.html sudo mv ${WORKSPACE}/output/log.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/log.html
